name: Redouble AI
headline: Scale human-in-the-loop for AI workflows in regulated industries
description: Redouble AI is the solution to scale human-in-the-loop for AI workflows in regulated industries. Instead of having to rely on slow and expensive human reviewers, Redouble’s clients save 80% of staff costs and significantly improve the accuracy and quality of their outputs by integrating our tool into their workflows. Addressing an $11BN market, the company is already generating revenue with its first set of clients. The founders are two serial entrepreneurs (who have built successful companies in AI and health-tech respectively) and a data engineering veteran who has written more than 120 enterprise-grade software applications.

founders.name: Martin Bittner, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Martin Bittner is the Co-Founder & CEO of Redouble AI. Before that, he was the CEO of Arctoris, a pharma workflow automation company which he co-founded and led from inception to profitability. In terms of background, Martin is a physician-scientist, having obtained his MD from the University of Freiburg in Germany, and his DPhil in Oncology as a Rhodes scholar at the University of Oxford.

founders.name: Haotian Li, Founder
founders.description: Haotian received his training in physics and computational chemistry from Zhejiang University and New York University. In 2017 Haotian cofounded the AI drug discovery start-up Redesign Science as CTO, designed and built the internal computational pipeline that increased the high through put screening efficiency by 100X.

founders.name: Andrey Santrosyan, Founder
founders.description: Andrey has spent 25 years in data and software engineering across Novartis and several startups. Specializing in devising and executing holistic data and software strategies, he led the development of over 120 software, data and AI applications, contributing to the successful market introduction of seven pharmaceutical products

generated_description:
**Redouble AI: Transforming AI Workflows in Regulated Industries**

Redouble AI is a dynamic startup founded in 2024 and currently part of Y Combinator Batch S24. Headquartered in the heart of San Francisco, the company is on a mission to scale human-in-the-loop processes for AI workflows specifically tailored for regulated industries. 

Let’s talk numbers: Redouble AI targets an $11 billion market. Clients have noticed a staggering **80% reduction in staff costs** by integrating Redouble's tools into their operations. And more importantly, these tools significantly enhance the accuracy and quality of outputs, which is crucial in regulated sectors.

The team behind Redouble AI is a powerhouse mix of expertise. Co-founders are two seasoned entrepreneurs with successful backgrounds in AI and health-tech, complemented by a data engineering veteran who has developed over 120 enterprise-grade software applications. With a lean crew of three, they’re already making waves in their sector.

### What Redouble AI Offers

1. **Comprehensive AI Solutions**: From planning to production, they provide full-cycle AI development tailored specifically to the unique needs of businesses.
   
2. **Real-Time Optimization**: They don’t just set it and forget it; their tools continuously optimize your company's data.

3. **Secure Deployment**: With options for managed cloud or on-premise deployments, security is a foundational aspect of their offerings.

4. **Full-Stack AI Support**: Redouble offers everything from conversational bots to autonomous agents, ensuring that clients have access to the best tech available.

5. **Customizable Dashboards**: Manage your AI outputs with ease through a user-friendly admin dashboard.

6. **Regulatory Compliance**: They ensure adherence to all relevant frameworks, addressing one of the biggest concerns of companies operating in regulated environments.

### The Redouble AI Approach

They are not just another generic AI tool provider; Redouble AI emphasizes tailored solutions. Every business has unique challenges and objectives, and they pride themselves on understanding these intricacies deeply before crafting customized solutions. Whether it's navigating the complexities of moving from pilot projects to full-scale implementation or ensuring continuous learning to enhance performance, their expertise is unwavering.

### Why Engage with Redouble?

Choosing Redouble AI means opting for a partner with proven results and a commitment to enhancing your operational efficiency. Their technology platform uniquely supports real-time AI output validation, making scaling mission-critical AI workflows both reliable and effective. 

So, if you’re standing at the crossroads of deploying AI in your organization and feeling overwhelmed, **Redouble AI** provides the guidance and expertise needed to take the first step and propel your business into the future with confidence.

For more information or to explore how they can specifically help your organization, check out their [website](https://redouble.ai/) or book a call directly with their team. 

This is more than just technology; it’s about unlocking the potential of AI to earn tangible returns for your business.
